name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watchtower: Track A/B tests on your website in real-time

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watchtower browser extension for Effective Experiments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track live experiments on your website in real-time!
Easily see all the running experiments on your website in real time. Visit these experiments and see a detailed overview, all directly from your browser. Watchtower is a first-in-class tool used by experimentation teams to share experimentation in the wider organization.
Simply setup your configurations within Effective Experiments app, share your access code with your teams and have them see where all the experiments are running. Additionally, track the engagement of your external teams and see whoâ€™s using the extension to track and visit experiments.
